verbose_text: The first line of defense mechanism is innate immunity which is glycosylated mucous (MUC2) that lines the epithelial cell of the intestine [XREF_BIBR] and cellular barrier represented by neutrophils that recruited by microbiome mediated recruitment via CXCR2 and macrophages [XREF_BIBR].
